FuncDef: This command creates a PW-port that can be bound to a physical port or associated with an FPE (anchored PW-port). A PW-port's purpose is to provide, through a PW-SAP, access level (or SAP level) capability to customer traffic that is tunneled to the SR OS node through an IP/MPLS network.

ParaDef.Info: ID of the PW-port. Values-1 to 32767.
Keyword required to create the configuration context.
